entry.title: Ringmaster commented on 'Evaluating Social Network Services'

link.title: Perhaps intentionally, you left out Care2Connect, http://Care2.com/connect. It's got a decided liberal activism bias but, given that, its a great...

entry.summary: Perhaps intentionally, you left out Care2Connect, http://Care2.com/connect. It's got a decided liberal activism bias but, given that, its a great...
entry.content:
Perhaps intentionally, you left out Care2Connect, http://Care2.com/connect. It's got a decided liberal activism bias but, given that, its a great social and dating network and you can include professional input as well.

Great article otherwise!

entry.title: Tino Buntic commented on 'Evaluating Social Network Services'

link.title: The problem with these social networking sites is that to get any benefit out of them you have to spend...

entry.summary: The problem with these social networking sites is that to get any benefit out of them you have to spend...
entry.content: The problem with these social networking sites is that to get any benefit out of them you have to spend hours a day on the sites.

entry.title: juan manuel commented on 'Evaluating Social Network Services'

link.title: It may be time to refresh this post by adding some of the more recent self-sufficient social networks driven not...

entry.summary: It may be time to refresh this post by adding some of the more recent self-sufficient social networks driven not...
entry.content: It may be time to refresh this post by adding some of the more recent self-sufficient social networks driven not by explicit affiliations but by patterns of behavior. These networks have the potential of growing much faster due to the low maintenance required on the user side.
